name: Mist & Lightning
description:
Submission for the 2021 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam. Jam Theme: Joined Together. All assets made in the jam period.

Keyboard or Controller supported.

In Mist & Lighting, you simultaneously control a fighter named Lydia and a mage named Felra. This game is a single boss fight, and takes under 5 minutes to beat.

Credits

Game Design and Programming: Daniel "Walker" McDonald

Art, Sound, Music, and Writing: Edwin "Teddy" Dykhoff
